name: Love Always Runs Away
description:
Keyofw and I's submission for GBJam 10! (Press Enter to start the game).

This is a game about a girl who preserves flowers to remember things that are important to her. Content Warning: suicide, death, breakups. There are two endings to the game, depending on tour decisions. You have to completely close the game to get the second ending once you get one, so make sure you completely restart/refresh the page.

Inspired by Regina Spektor's song "The Flowers."

Music by: keyofw

Art, programming, writing: Wrong Way Games

Cover art by: @paneladaddy

Controls:

Z = A

X = B

Enter = Start

Backspace = Select

Arrow Keys = D-pad
